name: google_immersive_product_search
description: Retrieve extra information on a product from "Immersive Product" block. When this block is clicked, Google will open a pop-up with complete product details.

page_token.description: Parameter defines the token needed to show more product info in Google immersive popup. Token is generated by SerpApi using Google Related Questions API.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: google_shopping_search
description: Scrape the results of a Google Shopping search.

query.description: Parameter defines the query you want to search. You can use anything that you would use in a regular Google Shopping search.

start.description: Parameter defines the result offset. It skips the given number of results. It's used for pagination. (e.g., 0 (default) is the first page of results, 60 is the 2nd page of results, 120 is the 3rd page of results, etc.).

num.description: Parameter defines the maximum number of results to return. (e.g., 3 (default) returns 3 results, 40 returns 40 results, and 100 (maximum) returns 100 results). Any number greater than maximum number (100) will default to 100. Any number less than minimum number (1) will default to 3.

device.description: Parameter defines the device to use to get the results. It can be set to desktop (default) to use a regular browser, tablet to use a tablet browser (currently using iPads), or mobile to use a mobile browser.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: google_product_search
description: Fetch the results from Google product pages via SerpApi service.

product_id.description: Parameter defines the product to get results for. Normally found from shopping results for supported products.

start.description: Parameter defines the result offset. It skips the given number of results. It's used for pagination. (e.g., 0 (default) is the first page of results, 10 is the 2nd page of results, 20 is the 3rd page of results, etc.) This parameter works only for Google Online Sellers and Reviews.

offers.description: Set it to True for fetching online sellers results.

specs.description: Set it to True for fetching specs results.

reviews.description: Set it to True for fetching reviews results.

device.description: Parameter defines the device to use to get the results. It can be set to desktop (default) to use a regular browser, tablet to use a tablet browser (currently using iPads), or mobile to use a mobile browser (currently using iPhones).

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
